text: Earl Gillespie (July 25, 1922-December 12, 2003)Social Security Death Index"Earl Gillespie, 81, Milwaukee Braves baseball announcer", The Boston Globe, Dec. 13, 2003. was a sportscaster. He called games for the Milwaukee Braves, Green Bay Packers, Wisconsin Badgers football and basketball, and Marquette Golden Eagles basketball. He also called games nationally for DuMont, NBC Radio, and Mutual Radio. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2003 deaths Category:College basketball broadcasters Category:Major League Baseball broadcasters Category:College football broadcasters Category:National Football League broadcasters
title: Earl Gillespie
